newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Former Russian energy minister to become govt aide.
newsitem.headline: Former Russian energy minister to become govt aide.

text.p: Russian Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin said he would appoint former fuel and energy minister Yuri Shafranik as his adviser, Itar-TASS news agency quoted Chernomyrdin as saying on Friday.
Shafranik was replaced on Thursday by Pyotr Rodionov, former head of RAO Gazprom's St Petersburg subsidiary.
Shafranik will become Chernomyrdin's aide on energy issues, Itar-TASS said.
